title: Laapataa Ladies' Oscars drama explained: How India selects 'official' entry, what is Film Federation of India's role - Hindustan Times
summary:
Laapataa Ladies' Oscars Drama Explained: How India Selects Official Entry

Date: Dec 19, 2024 Source: Hindustan Times

As Laapataa Ladies crashes out of the Oscars race, this article explores the selection process for India's 'official' entry to the Academy Awards, shedding light on the role of the Film Federation of India.

  • This year marks the 23rd consecutive year that India will not have a film in the Oscars' Best International Feature Film category.
  • The Film Federation of India (FFI) is responsible for selecting India's official entry for the Oscars.
  • Laapataa Ladies was chosen from nearly 30 contenders, including notable films like Animal and All We Imagine as Light.
  • Only one film can be submitted as an 'official' entry, but filmmakers can still submit titles independently for other categories.
  • Historically, three Indian films have been nominated for the Oscars: Mother India, Salaam Bombay, and Lagaan.
‚ÄúIt has never been without drama.‚Äù

The ongoing struggles in selecting a film for international representation highlight the challenges faced by Indian cinema on the global stage.
newTitle: Laapataa Ladies' Oscars Drama Explained: India's Official Selection Process

title: OTT Review: Leela Vinodham ‚Äì Telugu film on ETV Win - 123telugu
summary:
Leela Vinodham Telugu Movie Review

Release Date: December 19, 2024

Source: 123telugu.com

Leela Vinodham is the latest web film that premiered today on ETV Win. Popular YouTuber Shanmukh Jaswanth and the charming Anagha Ajith play the lead roles. Read our review to find out how it measures up.

Key Points

  • The story is set in 2008, focusing on a student, PMRK Prasad, who struggles to express his feelings for his classmate, Leela.
  • It captures the uncertainty of teenage love and nostalgia for the era before mobile phones were commonplace.
  • Shanmukh Jaswanth and Anagha Ajith deliver decent performances, with Mirchi Saran standing out for his comedic role.
  • The screenplay has issues with pacing, and certain scenes feel slow and underdeveloped.
  • While the film has appealing elements, it ultimately does not deliver a memorable experience.
‚ÄúLeela Vinodham is a village love story that works in a few parts but ultimately falls short of being memorable.‚Äù

In conclusion, while the film captures a nostalgic charm and has commendable performances, it struggles with pacing and emotional depth. Viewers might find other entertainment options more satisfying.
newTitle: Leela Vinodham Telugu Movie Review

title: Central India Crowns Pushpa 2 as the All-Time Box Office Champion, Surpassing Baahubali 2 - PINKVILLA
summary:
Central India Crowns Pushpa 2 as the All-Time Box Office Champion, Surpassing Baahubali 2

Publication Date: Dec 19, 2024 | Source: Pinkvilla

Pushpa 2 has officially become the highest-grossing film in Central India, with box office collections reaching Rs. 135 crore nett, surpassing the previous record held by Baahubali 2, which earned Rs. 123 crore.

  • Pushpa 2's total box office collections in India stand at Rs. 552.50 crore nett.
  • The film is set to close the gap with other top-grossing films, including Stree 2 and Jawan.
  • Pushpa 2 is especially popular in Central India, which includes Madhya Pradesh, Chhattisgarh, and parts of Gujarat and Maharashtra.
  • Only two other films have crossed Rs. 100 crore in Central India: Gadar 2 and Stree 2.
‚ÄúPushpa 2 is expected to widen the gap by a final number of over Rs. 175 crore.‚Äù

This achievement underscores the growing dominance of regional films in the Indian box office, challenging the traditional Bollywood hits.
newTitle: Pushpa 2 Becomes All-Time Box Office Champion in Central India
